JobIntro_Knight_caption1-null-null.name: People say the darkness has been wiped from our world... but I know\nwhat I've seen.

JobIntro_Knight_caption2-null-null.name: There is darkness in the hearts of our people.

JobIntro_Knight_caption3-null-null.name: The strong always tread upon the weak. It happened to me.

JobIntro_Knight_caption5-null-null.name: The world still has heroes who can help the weak.

JobIntro_Knight_caption6-null-null.name: A kind soul helped me on that fateful day, so I know they're\nout there.

JobIntro_Knight_caption7-null-null.name: Those who can help and protect others are the people who make\nthis world great.

JobIntro_Knight_caption8-null-null.name: I'm going to become one of those heroes...

JobIntro_Berserker_caption1-null-null.name: People fear the unknown. My parents did.

JobIntro_Berserker_caption2-null-null.name: The darkness in me drove them to abandon me.

JobIntro_Berserker_caption3-null-null.name: If the old man hadn't found me and taken me in...

JobIntro_Berserker_caption5-null-null.name: The old man didn't care about the power within me and raised me\nas his own.

JobIntro_Berserker_caption6-null-null.name: History, science, art... he taught me so many things I didn't care about.

JobIntro_Berserker_caption7-null-null.name: I found out later that he was once Maple World's greatest hero.

JobIntro_Berserker_caption8-null-null.name: I should thank him for raising me, and teaching me to be strong.

JobIntro_Berserker_caption9-null-null.name: And I'll surpass him, by becoming a stronger warrior!

JobIntro_Berserker_caption10-null-null.name: New heroes are meant to eclipse those that came before.

JobIntro_Berserker_caption11-null-null.name: Isn't that the best way to show respect for their efforts?

JobIntro_Berserker_caption12-null-null.name: So get ready, old man! Today's the day I beat you!

JobIntro_Wizard_caption2-null-null.name: What's this? We're one student short.

JobIntro_Wizard_caption4-null-null.name: Professor! We have quite a lot of magic to learn today.

JobIntro_Wizard_caption5-null-null.name: Are you going to waste our time waiting for one tardy student?

JobIntro_Wizard_caption6-null-null.name: An astute point, as usual, Miss Class President.

JobIntro_Wizard_caption7-null-null.name: Let's begin. What can anyone here tell me about monsters?

JobIntro_Priest_caption1-null-null.name: After the darkness vanished 15 years ago, I thought my duty would be\nto pray and sing of our past glory.

JobIntro_Priest_caption2-null-null.name: When I heard our peace was threatened again, a great fear grew\nin my heart.

JobIntro_Priest_caption3-null-null.name: But along with that fear... was hope. Hope that I would find\nnew purpose.

JobIntro_Priest_caption4-null-null.name: The guardian priests serve the will of the divine light.

JobIntro_Priest_caption5-null-null.name: And so, it is my duty to bring glory to this land once more!

JobIntro_Ranger_caption1-null-null.name: Not everything is as simple as it appears.

JobIntro_Ranger_caption2-null-null.name: It's an easy truth to forget.

JobIntro_Ranger_caption3-null-null.name: But no matter how hidden, the truth is always revealed in the end.

JobIntro_Ranger_caption4-null-null.name: Sometimes, you get to see the real side of a person for just a moment.

JobIntro_Ranger_caption5-null-null.name: A person who is stronger than anyone else, but keeps it hidden...

JobIntro_Ranger_caption6-null-null.name: A person who never hesitates to help when they are needed...

JobIntro_Ranger_caption7-null-null.name: A person whose footsteps I work hard to follow in.

JobIntro_HeavyGunner_caption1-null-null.name: My whole life, people have told me...

JobIntro_HeavyGunner_caption2-null-null.name: "Science alone cannot bring peace to Maple World."

JobIntro_HeavyGunner_caption3-null-null.name: That is a reasonable hypothesis... if you're an idiot!

JobIntro_HeavyGunner_caption4-null-null.name: The right technology? It can accomplish anything. It can break through\nany barrier. It can level any playing field!

JobIntro_HeavyGunner_caption5-null-null.name: So, my faithful assistant... Who's going to fix the world?

JobIntro_Thief_caption1-null-null.name: I can't remember anything about my parents.

JobIntro_Thief_caption2-null-null.name: My earliest childhood memories are of cold, dirty alleyways.

JobIntro_Thief_caption4-null-null.name: My friends were my family, the ones who stood by me.

JobIntro_Thief_caption5-null-null.name: Even now, we live the way we want. Our limits are our own.

JobIntro_Thief_caption6-null-null.name: No one can hold us back. I didn't choose the life of a rogue...

JobIntro_Assassin_caption2-null-null.name: We are the vanguard of darkness led by the Dark Lord, one of\nthe Seven Commanders.

JobIntro_Assassin_caption3-null-null.name: We have one mission: To eliminate everything that stands in\nthe way of the Black Mage.

JobIntro_Assassin_caption4-null-null.name: As a Rook, my own thoughts and emotions were purged so that\nI could focus on my work.

JobIntro_Assassin_caption6-null-null.name: I've begun to... feel again. And those feelings confuse me.

JobIntro_Assassin_caption7-null-null.name: Am I really working toward a better world?

JobIntro_Assassin_caption9-null-null.name: For once... I don't know what to do...

Common_Opening_caption1-null-null.name: You've answered the call. Now hear the story!

Common_Opening_caption2-null-null.name: It begins with two goddesses: one light, one dark.

Common_Opening_caption3-null-null.name: They created many worlds, but Maple World was their\ngreatest.

Common_Opening_caption4-null-null.name: In every realm, there must be balance.

Common_Opening_caption5-null-null.name: But the goddess of light loved Maple World and warded it\nagainst the darkness.

Common_Opening_caption6-null-null.name: Fearing this imbalance, the goddess of darkness lashed out.

Common_Opening_caption8-null-null.name: The battle was long and brutal, but, with the help of her sages,\nthe goddess of light defeated her sister.

Common_Opening_caption9-null-null.name: As the goddess of darkness fell, she unleashed her fury,\npoisoning Maple World with her power.

Common_Opening_caption10-null-null.name: Unwilling to see her beloved creation destroyed, the goddess of light\nsacrificed herself to save it.

Common_Opening_caption11-null-null.name: What remained of her power became the great protector,\nEmpress Ereve.

Common_Opening_caption12-null-null.name: Ereve gathered seven heroes to stand against the darkness.

Common_Opening_caption13-null-null.name: Try as they might, they could not stop their world's slow corruption.

Common_Opening_caption14-null-null.name: Ereve and her sages created three relics with power over life, space,\nand time: the Lapentas.

Common_Opening_caption15-null-null.name: These Lapentas could gather up the darkness and cleanse it all at once.\nSo they thought...

Common_Opening_caption16-null-null.name: The day of their bold plan came, and the shadows pooled\nin one place...

Common_Opening_caption17-null-null.name: Even as they cast their purification ritual, the sages were gripped\nby the darkness.

Common_Opening_caption18-null-null.name: It took all of the Lapentas' power to protect Maple World from being\nutterly destroyed.

Common_Opening_caption19-null-null.name: The ritual site was corrupted, the whole region becoming\na dreaded no-man's land.

Common_Opening_caption20-null-null.name: Two of Ereve's heroes, Cerian and Balon, stepped forward.

Common_Opening_caption21-null-null.name: They journeyed into this "Land of Darkness" on a mission to save\nanyone trapped inside.

Common_Opening_caption22-null-null.name: There, they worked to complete the purification ritual... and,\nin doing so, they met their end.

Common_Opening_caption23-null-null.name: The Land of Darkness was sealed away, where it could hurt\nno one else.

Common_Opening_caption24-null-null.name: With their noble sacrifice, these two heroes had bought peace.

Common_Opening_caption25-null-null.name: But now, the shadows stir once more, and this miraculous peace\nis nearing its end.

Common_Opening_caption26-null-null.name: The time has come for champions to rise again.

Common_Opening_caption27-null-null.name: This is a story of heroes.

SkyFortress_Intro_caption1-FameContents-.name: There's a chance we might be outnumbered.

SkyFortress_Intro_caption4-FameContents-.name: I see you've found new allies.

SkyFortress_Intro_caption5-FameContents-.name: They won't save you from me.

SkyFortress_Intro_caption10-FameContents.name: Hurry up, the ship's about to launch!

SkyFortress_Intro_caption11-FameContents.name: Flight checks complete—\nBut we still have crew on the ground!

SkyFortress_Intro_caption15-FameContents.name: Take us up!\nFire the XR shells, on my markl!

SkyFortress_Intro_caption19-FameContents.name: Karl, Luanna. Look there.\nThey really did it.

SkyFortress_Intro_caption20-FameContents.name: A new era dawns on Maple World.

SkyFortress_Intro_caption21-FameContents.name: Brave guardians, please watch over us from above.

Lapenta_Frontier_Intro_caption1-LapentaF.name: Brighter than the stars in the night

Lapenta_Frontier_Intro_caption4-LapentaF.name: Forget the darkness of the past\n(Rise up again)

Lapenta_Frontier_Intro_caption5-LapentaF.name: And the trembling in your heart\n(Don't be afraid)

Lapenta_Frontier_Intro_caption6-LapentaF.name: Your story has only just begun\n(Don't lose heart)

Lapenta_Frontier_Intro_caption7-LapentaF.name: The future is calling\n(I'm right beside you)

Lapenta_Frontier_Intro_caption9-LapentaF.name: That guiding light of hope\nis a promise

Lapenta_Frontier_Intro_caption11-Lapenta.name: Stay true to yourself and your dream\nwill come to pass

Lapenta_Frontier_Intro_caption12-Lapenta.name: It's far too soon for your story to end

Lapenta_Frontier_Intro_caption13-Lapenta.name: Call out the name\nthat trembles on your lips

Lapenta_Frontier_Intro_caption14-Lapenta.name: Even when you have no voice,\nI'll hear your cry
